document_data.caption: A map of Silla showing the location of Xi.
document_data.name: Xi
document_data.mainbody:
'''Xi''' was a town in the kingdom of [[Koryo]] in [[Kara-Tur]], lying in the northern [[Vorkani Mountains]]. The mountains separated Xi from the rest of [[Koryo]].

Around [[1357 DR]], the town was the base of the [[ninja]] clan known as the [[Panthers of Xi]].
